name: Caersid Tail
description: The Caersid Tail bespeaks the spirit of the vengeful warrior.

languages.description: Der Caersid-Schweif zeugt vom Geist des rachsüchtigen Kriegers.
languages.name: Schweif: Caersid

languages.description: La Queue Caersid représente l'esprit du guerrier vengeur.
languages.name: Queue Caersid

languages.description: La Coda Caersid rivela lo spirito del guerriero vendicativo.
languages.name: Coda Caersid

languages.description: 케어시드 꼬리는 복수심에 불타는 전사의 영혼을 체현합니다.
languages.name: 케어시드 꼬리

languages.description: La cola Caersid representa el espíritu del guerrero vengador.
languages.name: Cola Caersid

languages.description: 战坞马尾彰显着复仇战士的精神。
languages.name: 战坞马尾

languages.description: Caersidテールは復讐に燃える戦士の精神を表す。
languages.name: Caersid テール

languages.description: Ogon Caersid przywołuje ducha mściwego wojownika.
languages.name: Ogon: Caersid

languages.description: A Cauda Caersid representa o espírito de um guerreiro implacável.
languages.name: Cauda Caersid

languages.description: 凱魂馬尾預示著復仇戰士的精神。
languages.name: 凱魂馬尾

languages.description: หาง Caersid บ่งบอกถึงจิตวิญญาณของนักรบผู้ต้องการล้างแค้น
languages.name: หาง Caersid

languages.description: Caersid Kuyruğu intikamcı savaşçının ruhunu anlatıyor.
languages.name: Caersid Kuyruğu
